name: Michael McKENZIE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA ASSIGNED CLAIMS PLAN c/o Travelers Insurance Company

judges: Before LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.

parties: Michael McKENZIE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA ASSIGNED CLAIMS PLAN c/o Travelers Insurance Company.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ronald Jay Bayer, Philadelphia, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
584 A.2d 1388
Michael McKENZIE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA ASSIGNED CLAIMS PLAN c/o Travelers Insurance Company.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 15, 1991.
Decided Feb. 7, 1991.
Ronald Jay Bayer, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Jeffrey A. Less, A. Richard Feldman, Philadelphia, for Pennsylvania Assigned Claims Plan and Travelers Ins. Co.
Before LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
